messages.subject: RE:  Pagan
messages.msgSnippet: Our local Unitarian Universalist church is home to a number of Pagan families, including the minister!  Have you checked out any in your area?
messages.messageBody:
Our local Unitarian Universalist church is home to a number of Pagan
families, including the minister! Have you checked out any in your area?

messages.subject: Pagan
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all I have added a group to yahoo for unschoolers who celebrate earth based religions and beliefs. Just a place to share the rhythms of the earth and the
messages.messageBody:
Hi all
I have added a group to yahoo for unschoolers who celebrate earth
based religions and beliefs. Just a place to share the rhythms of the
earth and the seasons of our childrens lives. Maybe share links and
ideas for upcoming festivals such as candlemas (imbolc)
You can find it at pagan_unschoolers
have a beautiful day!

messages.subject: Re: Pagan
messages.msgSnippet: I just joined :) I m pagan and so are my two children...as my oldest proudly informed me the other day...although she claimed that the youngest is pagan and
messages.messageBody:
I just joined :)
I'm pagan and so are my two children...as my oldest proudly informed me the
other day...although she claimed that the youngest is pagan and
catholic...although the little one is only 2 :) This is because my spouse
was raised catholic and has not declared himself pagan...although his ideas
are decidely pagan :)

In Her Name...
~`*S*`~

generations to come?

in five, power in

decline and fall_
